info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued May 13 at 3:21PM MDT until May 13 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.description:
The National Weather Service in El Paso has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Otero County in south central New Mexico... Eastern Sierra County in south central New Mexico... Northeastern Dona Ana County in south central New Mexico... Northern Hudspeth County in western Texas...
* Until 615 PM MDT.
* At 320 PM MDT, an area of blowing dust was over Timberon.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong winds up to 50 mph.
SOURCE...Satellite imagery.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
* This includes the following highways... Highway 70 in New Mexico between mile markers 180 and 212. Highway 54 in New Mexico between mile markers 1 and 86.
Locations impacted include... Timberon, Chaparral, White Sands National Park, Sacramento, Orogrande, Tularosa, Alamogordo, Sunspot, Pinon, Mayhill, Weed, La Luz, McGregor Range Base, Holloman Air Force Base, Cornudas Mountains, Benson Ridge, Hay Canyon, Cox Canyon, Boles Acres, and Karr Canyon.
info.instruction:
Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
There is no safe place on a highway when a dust storm hits. Visibility can be lost immediately, making it difficult or impossible to slow down and avoid stopped vehicles. Delay travel, or safely exit the highway before the dust storm arrives.

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 6:15 PM MDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 6:15 PM MDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

area.areaDesc: Dona Ana, NM; Otero, NM; Sierra, NM; Hudspeth, TX

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 6:15 PM MDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 6:15 PM MDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.

area.areaDesc: Dona Ana, NM; Otero, NM; Sierra, NM; Hudspeth, TX
